      • getInstance

        public static ExportSection getInstance(byte[] edataBytes,
                        long virtualAddress,
                        OptionalHeader opt)
        Creates an instance of the export section by loading all necessary information from the given export section bytes

        Parameters:
        edataBytes - the bytes of the export section
        virtualAddress - the virtual address from the data directory entry table that points to the export section
        opt - optional header of the file
        Returns:
        instance of the export section

      • getPointerNameMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.String> getPointerNameMap()
        Returns a map of address-name pairs contained in the name pointer table

        Returns:
        a map that contains addresses as key and names as value

      • getNamePointers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getNamePointers()
        Returns a list of all pointers of the name pointer table, ordered.

        Returns:
        all pointers/addresses of the name pointer table

      • getOrdinals

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getOrdinals()
        Returns an ordered list of all ordinals in the ordinal table

        Returns:
        a list of all ordinals in the order they are found in the ordinal table

      • getOrdinalForName

        public int getOrdinalForName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the name for a given ordinal.

        This maps a given name of the name pointer table to the ordinal in the ordinal table.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of an exported function
        Returns:
        the ordinal for the given function name

      • getSymbolRVAForName

        public long getSymbolRVAForName(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the relative virtual address for a given function name.

        This maps a name of the name pointer table the corresponding address of the export address table.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the exported function
        Returns:
        the rva out of the address table for a function name

      • getExportEntries

        public java.util.List<ExportEntry> getExportEntries()
        Returns a list of all export entries found in the export section

        Returns:
        a list of all export entries

      • getDetailedInfo

        public java.lang.String getDetailedInfo()
        Returns a detailed info string that represents the inner structure of the export section. That means the contents of the different tables are not mapped to each other.

        Returns:
        a detailed info string

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        Returns a description string of the export entries found.

        Specified by:
        getInfo in interface SpecialSection
        Returns:
        description string
